text: Ruah Midbar (, lit. Desert Wind) is a rehabilitation centre in southern Israel. Located between Ashalim and Tlalim, it falls under the jurisdiction of Ramat Negev Regional Council. In its population was . The centre was opened in 2010 as a collaboration between the regional council, the Anti-Drug Authority, the Jewish National Fund, Mifal HaPayis, the Rashi Foundation and several government departments. It serves people suffering from drug and alcohol addiction and eating disorders, and is run by the Yahadu Association.רוח מדבר Yachdav ==References== Category:Populated places established in 2010 Category:2010 establishments in Israel Category:Populated places in Southern District (Israel)
title: Ruah Midbar
